IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROMOTE THE FINANCIAL VITALITY OF MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ABBEY FOUNDATION OF OREGON PROMOTES THE FINANCIAL VITALITY OF MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY BY SEEKING OPERATING SUPPORT IN ADDITION TO SPECIAL PROJECT FUNDING AND LONG-TERM ENDOWMENTS FOR THE MONASTERY, MT. ANGEL SEMINARY, THE RETREAT AND GUEST PROGRAMS, AND THE LIBRARY. THE FOUNDATION WORKS COLLABORATIVELY WITH MT. ANGEL ABBEY TO IMPLEMENT THE MONASTIC COMMUNITY'S BENEDICTINE VISION OF PRAYER AND WORK IN SERVICE TO THE CHURCH IN WESTERN OREGON AND BEYOND.
IRS990.Desc: THE ABBEY FOUNDATION OF OREGON WAS ESTABLISHED TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF MT. ANGEL ABBEY, INCLUDING THE MT. ANGEL MONASTERY, SEMINARY, LIBRARY AND GUEST HOUSE. MT. ANGEL ABBEY IS A MONASTIC COMMUNITY FORMED IN 1882 WHICH OPERATES THE SECOND LARGEST CATHOLIC SEMINARY IN THE UNITED STATES. THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES GRANTS TO MT. ANGEL ABBEY AND OPERATES PRIMARILY IN THREE AREAS: OPERATING SUPPORT: THE FOUNDATION MAKES GRANTS TO MT. ANGEL ABBEY TO HELP UNDERWRITE THE COST OF EDUCATION FOR SEMINARIANS AT THE MT. ANGEL SEMINARY. CAPITAL SUPPORT: THE FOUNDATION RAISES FUNDS FOR THE VARIOUS CAPITAL NEEDS OF MT. ANGEL ABBEY. ENDOWMENT SUPPORT: THE FOUNDATION ALSO ADMINISTERS A NUMBER OF ENDOWMENTS CREATED BY GIFTS FROM DONORS IN SUPPORT OF MT. ANGEL ABBEY AND ITS PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION ADMINISTERS A NUMBER OF ENDOWMENTS CREATED BY GIFTS FROM DONORS IN SUPPORT OF MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY AND ITS PROGRAMS.

THE FOUNDATION FOLLOWS ACCOUNTING STANDARDS GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA RELATED TO THE RECOGNITION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE FOUNDATION RECOGNIZES ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS PART OF THE STATEMENT OF ACTIVITIES, WHEN APPLICABLE. MANAGEMENT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE FOUNDATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2018 OR 2017, AND THEREFORE NO AMOUNTS HAVE BEEN ACCRUED.
CHANGE IN CHARITABLE TRUST 9,676. SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES NETTED WITH REVENUE 237,471.
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES NETTED WITH REVENUE 237,471. IMPAIRMENT OF ASSET HELD FOR SALE 15,000.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT THE PROGRAMS AND OPERATIONS OF MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION MONITORS THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS BY MONITORING THE PROGRESS OF SPECIFIC PROGRAMS AND PROJECTS AS WELL AS REVIEWING THE ANNUAL REPORT OF MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY THAT DISCLOSES THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A MANAGEMENT AGREEMENT WITH MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY THAT PROVIDES MANAGEMENT AND SUPPORT SERVICES FOR BUSINESS OFFICE SERVICES, DEVELOPMENT OF PROGRAM MANAGEMENT AND HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOLLOWING ITEMS LISTED BELOW REQUIRE CONSENT FROM MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY A RELATED ORGANIZATION: (A) TO AMEND THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION; (B) TO MODIFY THE BYLAWS; (C) TO ALIENATE ASSETS OF THE FOUNDATION FOR ANY PURPOSE OTHER THAN THE SUPPORT OF MOUNT ANGEL ABBEY AND ITS ACTIVITIES; (D) TO SUPPRESS THE FOUNDATION; (E) TO CONTRACT DEBTS ON BEHALF OF THE FOUNDATION OTHER THAN IN THE ORDINARY COURSE OF BUSINESS; (F) TO ESTABLISH SUBSIDIARY FOUNDATIONS; OR (G) TO MODIFY THE MISSION AS DESCRIBED IN ARTICLE 2 OF THESE BYLAWS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDED A COPY OF THE FORM 990 TO BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW AT A BOARD MEETING PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS AGREE TO THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AT THE TIME THEY BECOME BOARD MEMBERS. BOARD MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO DISCLOSE POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND MAKE THE BOARD AWARE BEFORE ENTERING INTO SUCH RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRESENTLY, THE ABBEY FOUNDATION OF OREGON DOES NOT MAKE THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE TRUST 9,676. IMPAIRMENT OF ASSET HELD FOR SALE -15,000. GAAP/TAX DIFFERENCE PARTNERSHIP K-1 UBI -12,348.
